title: OUTDATED: Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Recall
subtitle: Rumor: Kraft Foods has recalled 242,000 cases of their Macaroni & Cheese Dinner due to possible contamination by metal fragments.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Kraft Foods has recalled 242,000 cases of their Macaroni & Cheese Dinner due to possible contamination by metal fragments.
